oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarksville-Montgomery County Consolidated Government Charter Commission: Salary Proposals, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Drafted in September 1980 by the Charter Commission, This document proposed potential salaries for the executive, council, and department directors under the consolidated form of government.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Public works; Government executives; Executive departments--Tennessee; Municipal courts--Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
